return.value: Product Name String - Product Name Short Number - Product Version Number Number - Product Build Number String (Arma 3) - Product Branch Boolean (Arma 3) - Product is launched using mods true or vanilla false String (Arma 3) - Platform ("Windows", "Linux" or "OSX") String (Arma 3) - Architecture - x64 for 64bit or x86 for 32bit Since version 1.67
